panels.visual: Race starting line Multiple sleds lined up Rope dropping **Sound EFFECTS:** "GO!"
Val's sled leaping forward with magical boost Leaving trail of sparks **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHOOOOSH!"
Midway down - displacement magic gone wrong Val swerving wildly as space warps **Sound EFFECTS:** "BRZZZZT!"
Prismor hitting thornbushes Cloak tearing, taking damage **Sound EFFECTS:** "CRASH!"
panels.dialogue: Prismor: "Ugh! These weren't here in previous years!"
